snippet: Brandon Sherrod, a starting forward for the Yale men’s basketball team, took off this school year to sing, perform and travel with the Whiffenpoofs, the university’s all-male a cappella group.
abstract: Yale starting forward Brandon Sherrod, who has always had passion for music, takes year off school and basketball team after accepting position with prestigious a cappella group Whiffenpoofs; can rejoin team next year, but will not get to play as senior with familiar teammates.
lead_paragraph: Brandon Sherrod, a starting forward for the Yale men’s basketball team, took off this school year to sing, perform and travel with the Whiffenpoofs, the university’s all-male a cappella group.

headline.seo: Yale Forward Brandon Sherrod Takes a Break to Sing With the Whiffenpoofs
headline.main: At Yale, Trading a Playbook for a Songbook
headline.print_headline: Jumpers Can Wait: He’s Hitting Notes
